title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 450.5 - Inspection of risks
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 450.5 - Inspection of risks

State Regulations

Underwriters, payroll auditors and field service
representatives are designated for the purpose of inspecting the plants and
establishment of employers insured with the State Fund and shall make such
reports thereof as may be required. Recommendations, whenever possible, shall
be given to the policyholder as to means and methods which will tend to reduce
accidents and diseases and to safeguard the health and safety of
workers. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
450.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
